channel.title: Guide on Sander Schutten's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Guide on Sander Schutten's Blog

item.title: MCE Guide Editor source code
item.description: I got a few requests for the source code of MCE Guide Editor. I once started working on a new release of it and during the process I discovered that the solution I chose wasn’t going to work. This meant I didn’t have the source of the working version of the tool. What I did was disassemble the executable. I’m currently working on a Windows 7 PC, so I wasn’t able to compile the disassembled code because I’m missing the ehome dll.

item.title: Microsoft BizTalk Server Performance Optimization Guide
item.description: From MSDN: Welcome to the first edition of the Microsoft® BizTalk® Server Performance Optimizations Guide. We created this guide to provide in depth information for optimizing the performance of a BizTalk Server solution. Full end-to-end performance testing is frequently overlooked during enterprise application deployment. Knowing that Microsoft has built a scalable messaging infrastructure, many organizations that use BizTalk Server spend little or no time conducting performance testing of their own applications.
